conversation_history.content:
Assalamu Alaikum! Assalamu alaikum! Mehwish Chat AI 3.0 ki taraf se khush amdeed! (Hello! Welcome to Mehwish Chat AI 3.0!)

Main aap ki kisi bhi sawaal ka jawab dena chahti hoon. Kripya aapne puchhne wale sawaal ko likh dein. (I'm here to answer any of your questions. Please go ahead and ask your question.)

Note: If you need help in a specific domain or topic, please let me know and I'll do my best to assist you.
